proposedChanges.value: Move the hero image to the right and the headline to the left.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves text visibility and draws attention to the message.

proposedChanges.value: Use a grid layout to separate pricing tiers for easy comparison.
proposedChanges.rationale: Facilitates quick scanning and comparison of offerings.

proposedChanges.value: Place the trust section above the solution section.
Make the hero CTA a contrasting color for higher visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases likelihood of interaction with the CTA.

proposedChanges.value: Include customer testimonials with logos in the trust section.
Stack the headline above the image for better readability on mobile.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures the message is seen first on smaller screens.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure the CTA is always visible on mobile by using a sticky footer.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases CTA accessibility and conversion potential.

proposedChanges.value: Add a sticky CTA button that follows users as they scroll.
proposedChanges.rationale: Keeps the call-to-action top of mind for users.

assumptions: Small business owners value trust and ease of use
Current design lacks optimal conversion elements
